verses.verse: <S%H430>God<s%> be <S%H2603>merciful<s%> unto <S%H1288>us<s%>, and bless <S%H6440>us<s%>; and cause his face to <S%H215>shine<s%> upon <S%H5542>us<s%>; Selah.
That your <S%H1870>way<s%> may be <S%H3045>known<s%> upon <S%H776>earth<s%>, your except <S%H3444>health<s%> among all <S%H1471>nations<s%>.
Let the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3034>praise<s%> <S%H430>you<s%>, O God; let all the <S%H5971>people<s%> praise <S%H3034>you<s%>.

O let the <S%H3816>nations<s%> be <S%H8055>glad<s%> and sing for <S%H7442>joy<s%>: for you shall <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H4334>righteously<s%>, and <S%H5148>govern<s%> the <S%H3816>nations<s%> upon <S%H776>earth<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.
Let the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3034>praise<s%> <S%H430>you<s%>, O God; let all the <S%H5971>people<s%> praise <S%H3034>you<s%>.
Then shall the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H5414>yield<s%> her <S%H2981>increase<s%>; and <S%H430>God<s%>, even our own <S%H430>God<s%>, shall bless <S%H1288>us<s%>.
<S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H657>us<s%>; and all the ends of the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall fear <S%H3372>him<s%>.
